title: (x) "Lucero" wide slab serif on DVD cover - Hellenic Wide {Marc O}
content:
I was wondering what typeface is used for Lucero  
 [http://ecx.images-amazon.com/images/I/51XM3JRTJHL.\_AA240\_.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20081203112949/http:/ecx.images-amazon.com/images/I/51XM3JRTJHL._AA240_.jpg)

 [‹ (x) curvy woodcut script on cover of Eye magazine 65 - various {Stephen}](http://web.archive.org/web/20081203112949/http:/www.typophile.com/node/38784 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) Degriz logo wide techno/scifi display face - D3 Euronism {Mike F} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081203112949/http:/www.typophile.com/node/38775 "Go to next forum topic")
author: phaedrus

comments.content:
Hellenic Wide, Zapata, 58 Rodeo, Platon, or Lonestar are all close.

[http://www.veer.com/search/results.aspx?keyword=JBT0000094%20JBT0000095%...](http://web.archive.org/web/20081203112949/http:/www.veer.com/search/results.aspx?keyword=JBT0000094%20JBT0000095%20JBT0000096 "http://www.veer.com/search/results.aspx?keyword=JBT0000094%20JBT0000095%20JBT0000096")  
 [http://www.fontshop.com/search/?q=zapata&x=0&y=0](http://web.archive.org/web/20081203112949/http:/www.fontshop.com/search/?q=zapata&x=0&y=0 "http://www.fontshop.com/search/?q=zapata&x=0&y=0")  
 [http://www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/baseline/58\_rodeo/?sample\_text=WIE...](http://web.archive.org/web/20081203112949/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/baseline/58_rodeo/?sample_text=WIELER&sample_size=48 "http://www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/baseline/58\_rodeo/?sample\_text=WIELER&sample\_size=48")  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/fontmesa/lonestar/](http://web.archive.org/web/20081203112949/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/fontmesa/lonestar/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/fontmesa/lonestar/")  
 [http://www.csaimages.com/results.asp?image=FNT018&wwwflag=2&imagepos=18](http://web.archive.org/web/20081203112949/http:/www.csaimages.com/results.asp?image=FNT018&wwwflag=2&imagepos=18 "http://www.csaimages.com/results.asp?image=FNT018&wwwflag=2&imagepos=18")
Thanks a lot for the quick response. Those are all defintely close enough for me
